summary:
HELLO !

I’m experienced C and C++ developer with love to network protocols.

Most of the time I did work with Embedded Linux however I have experience with Embedded Windows and Windows CE and regular desktop applications.

I have really big experience of implementations different communications and data transfer protocols from standard for industrial systems like MODBUS, standard for network like file transfers protocols FTP, up to multimedia streaming protocols RTP/RTCP, telephony SIP and many others.

I’m flexible to work and develop fully new software with using modern technologies as well as supporting existing SDKs and legacy codebase (preferably with opportunity for refactoring).

Key knowledge:
* C and C++ up to 11/14/17/20
* Linux, including Linux kernel modules
* Virtualisation, like Docker and Podman as well as neverending classic - Oracle Virtual Box
* CI/CD based on GitLab/Gitea and/or Jenkins etc.
